CustomField.description: Disables the Apex trigger for FeedComment undeletes. If this is checked, then feedCommentUndeleted subscriptions will not be available.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Disables the Apex trigger for FeedComment undeletes. If this is checked, then feedCommentUndeleted subscriptions will not be available.
CustomField.label: Disable FeedComment Undelete Trigger
